2105.verse: وَإِن|And indeed,|98|106|213$كَادُواْ|they were about|130|146|694$لَيَسْتَفِزُّونَكَ|(to) scare you|125|141|10479$مِنَ|from|50|66|156$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land,|92|108|100$لِيُخْرِجُوكَ|that they evict you|150|158|10480$مِنْهَا‌ۖ|from it.|68|75|246$وَإِذًا|But then|77|91|4156$لَّا|not|42|56|30$يَلْبَثُونَ|they (would) have stayed|192|206|10481$خِلَـٰفَكَ|after you|81|95|10482$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$قَلِيلاً|a little.|67|74|433$

2107.verse: أَقِمِ|Establish|78|95|10487$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer,|94|128|38$لِدُلُوكِ|at the decline|112|146|10488$ٱلشَّمْسِ|(of) the sun|100|134|10489$إِلَىٰ|till|53|87|118$غَسَقِ|(the) darkness|117|134|10490$ٱلَّيْلِ|(of) the night|110|120|1418$وَقُرْءَانَ|and Quran|96|115|10491$ٱلْفَجْرِ‌ۖ|at dawn,|79|98|1645$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|87|58$قُرْءَانَ|the Quran|86|105|10492$ٱلْفَجْرِ|(at) the dawn|113|132|1645$كَانَ|is|57|67|913$مَشْهُودًا|ever witnessed.|125|125|10493$

2108.verse: وَمِنَ|And from|79|91|74$ٱلَّيْلِ|the night|80|104|1418$فَتَهَجَّدْ|arise from sleep for prayer|194|218|10494$بِهِۦ|with it|62|86|204$نَافِلَةً|(as) additional|115|139|10495$لَّكَ|for you;|73|85|323$عَسَىٰٓ|it may be|82|96|4255$أَن|that|48|76|655$يَبْعَثَكَ|will raise you|105|133|10496$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|110|310$مَقَامًا|(to) a station|110|138|10497$مَّحْمُودًا|praiseworthy.|110|124|10498$

2110.verse: وَقُلْ|And say,|78|85|2709$جَآءَ|"Has come|89|102|4023$ٱلْحَقُّ|the truth|80|93|268$وَزَهَقَ|and perished|104|117|10503$ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ‌ۚ|the falsehood.|115|128|10504$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ|the falsehood|110|117|7153$كَانَ|is|57|294|913$زَهُوقًا|(bound) to perish."|145|382|10505$

2111.verse: وَنُنَزِّلُ|And We reveal|116|129|10506$مِنَ|from|50|77|156$ٱلْقُرْءَانِ|the Quran|95|122|10369$مَا|that|48|75|262$هُوَ|it|48|75|298$شِفَآءٌ|(is) a healing|106|133|10042$وَرَحْمَةٌ|and a mercy|102|115|1376$لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ‌ۙ|for the believers,|133|144|923$وَلَا|but not|69|90|25$يَزِيدُ|it increases|96|117|10507$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|144|377$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$خَسَارًا|(in) loss.|84|94|10508$

2112.verse: وَإِذَآ|And when|85|93|96$أَنْعَمْنَا|We bestow favor|133|149|10509$عَلَى|on|63|79|52$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ|man|90|106|10510$أَعْرَضَ|he turns away|115|131|10511$وَنَـَٔـا|and becomes remote|158|166|10512$بِجَانِبِهِۦ‌ۖ|on his side.|95|112|10513$وَإِذَا|And when|85|119|96$مَسَّهُ|touches him|100|134|10514$ٱلشَّرُّ|the evil|69|103|10515$كَانَ|he is|57|91|913$يَــُٔوسًا|(in) despair.|100|117|10516$

2115.verse: وَلَئِن|And if|66|76|1309$شِئْنَا|We willed,|87|108|7000$لَنَذْهَبَنَّ|We (would) have surely taken away|259|280|10522$بِٱلَّذِىٓ|that which|91|112|597$أَوْحَيْنَآ|We have revealed|139|149|4640$إِلَيْكَ|to you.|68|83|45$ثُمَّ|Then|53|84|293$لَا|not|42|73|30$تَجِدُ|you would find|116|147|2762$لَكَ|for you|67|98|323$بِهِۦ|concerning it|106|137|204$عَلَيْنَا|against Us|89|104|681$وَكِيلاً|any advocate,|116|116|4237$

2105.verse: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little.

2106.verse: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.

2107.verse: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.

2108.verse: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station.

2109.verse: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority."

2110.verse: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart."

2111.verse: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.

2112.verse: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.

2113.verse: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."

2114.verse: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."

2115.verse: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us.
